event.title: "Free Software for Science" with Georg Greve in Konstanz, Germany
event.body: Georg C. F. Greve, FSFE's founding president and CEO of Kolab Systems AG will hold a talk on 12th of November about Free Software and its advantages in research and teaching in the University of Konstanz, room V 1001. The talk starts at 18:30 and addresses students, teachers, and IT authorities likewise. Admission is free, but please consider pre-registering on the event website.
